= g commands =
1. g
2. gj, gk, g0, g$
3. gq
4. ~
5. g~ --> make letters capitalized(word or letter)
6. gUU --> make whole line capitalized
7. gUfl --> make letters capitalized till l
	- gnu/linux --> GNU/Linux
8. ^ --> move to previous file
9. gv --> reselect text
10. J --> join lines with spaces in between
11. gJ --> join lines without spaces in between
12. g& --> substitute through out the document(when you use substitute before 
	that command will run again when u use g&)
